text: Thomas William Lester (September 23, 1938 â€“ April 20, 2020) was an American actor and evangelist. He is best known for his role as farmhand Eb Dawson on the television series Green Acres. He appeared in the feature movies Gordy and Benji. On April 20, 2020, Lester died due to problems caused by Parkinson's disease in Nashville, Tennessee. He was 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Tennessee
